name: issues_check-user-can-be-assigned-to-issue
description:
Checks if a user has permission to be assigned to a specific issue.

If the `assignee` can be assigned to this issue, a `204` status code with no content is returned.

Otherwise a `404` status code is returned.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

issue_number.description: The number that identifies the issue.
